item.description: Please join us for our monthly potluck fiesta! Meet new friends who share your interest in improving or maintaining language skills. This (mostly) Spanish conversation fiesta takes place at a private home a mile west of West Hartford Center. Bring a SMALL amount of food to share. If you can, let us know in your RSVP what you'll bring.

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: The Hartford Spanish Language April Meeting
